summary: TRANSMISSION IN MY 2000 DODGE DURANGO SPORT 2X4 HAS FAILED TWO TIMES PLACING THE DRIVER AND THE GENERAL PUBLIC IN A DANGEROUS SITUATION.  BOTH TIMES THE VEHICLE WAS BEING DRIVEN ON A FREEWAY WITH SPEEDS UP TO 55 MPH WHEN THE TRANSMISSION SLIPPED AND KEPT THE VEHICLE AT 30 MPH.  THE VEHICLE WAS SENT IN ONCE BEFORE THIS RESULTING IN A REBUILT TRANSMISSION FROM A "GENERIC" TRANSMISSION SHOP.  NOW THE VEHICLE IS SLIPPING ON OCCASSION AND THE DEALERSHIP AFTER PROMISING A BRAND NEW TRANSMISSION FROM A CERTIFIED DODGE DEALERSHIP HAS FAILED TO COMPLY.
